de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation

Class ValidationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.lambeck.pned.models.data.validation.ValidationController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IValidationController, java.lang.Runnable

    public class ValidationController
extends java.lang.Thread
implements IValidationController
    Implements a Thread which regularly checks the current IDataModel of the IDataModelController with a variable Map of type AbstractValidator.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean ALWAYS_REMOVE_INITIAL_CHECK_STATE
      Predefined parameter because the ValidationController should always remove the "initial check" state from the IDataModel.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,EValidationResultSeverity> currentValidationStatus
      A Map to store the highest previous EValidationResultSeverity for the current set of validations and the specified model.
      private static int CYCLE_SLEEP_TIME
      The sleep time between validation cycles.
      private static boolean debug
      Show debug messages?
      protected I18NManager i18n
      The manager for localized strings
      private IDataModelController myDataModelController
      The reference to the data model controller, which provides the current data model.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IValidator> validatorMap
      The Map of AbstractValidator to run on each DataModel.

    • Field Detail

      • debug

        private static boolean debug
        Show debug messages?

      • CYCLE_SLEEP_TIME

        private static final int CYCLE_SLEEP_TIME
        The sleep time between validation cycles. (Smaller values = faster reaction to changes on the draw panel, higher values = save CPU power)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ALWAYS_REMOVE_INITIAL_CHECK_STATE

        private static final boolean ALWAYS_REMOVE_INITIAL_CHECK_STATE
        Predefined parameter because the ValidationController should always remove the "initial check" state from the IDataModel.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • myDataModelController

        private IDataModelController myDataModelController
        The reference to the data model controller, which provides the current data model.

      • i18n

        protected I18NManager i18n
        The manager for localized strings

      • validatorMap

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,IValidator> validatorMap
        The Map of AbstractValidator to run on each DataModel. (validatorMap uses LinkedHashMap to preserve the order of validations.)

      • currentValidationStatus

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,EValidationResultSeverity> currentValidationStatus
        A Map to store the highest previous EValidationResultSeverity for the current set of validations and the specified model. Note: This is necessary because the user can switch between files!

      • getCurrentValidationStatus

        public EValidationResultSeverity getCurrentValidationStatus(java.lang.String modelName)
        Description copied from interface: IValidationController
        Returns the highest previous EValidationResultSeverity for the current set of validations and the specified model. Note: this is intended to be used by some IValidator to decide whether to skip some checks or not.
        Specified by:
        getCurrentValidationStatus in interface IValidationController
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        Returns:
        EValidationResultSeverity

      • requestIndividualValidation

        public void requestIndividualValidation(java.lang.String validatorName,
                                        IDataModel dataModel)
        Description copied from interface: IValidationController
        Request to the IValidationController thread to run the specified IValidator on the specified IDataModel.
        Specified by:
        requestIndividualValidation in interface IValidationController
        Parameters:
        validatorName - The specified IValidator
        dataModel - The specified IDataModel

      • modelRenamed

        public void modelRenamed(java.lang.String oldModelName,
                         java.lang.String newModelName)
        Description copied from interface: IValidationController
        Informs the IValidationController to update internal references because a model has been renamed. (This should happen only on SaveAs operations.)
        Specified by:
        modelRenamed in interface IValidationController
        Parameters:
        oldModelName - The model name before renaming
        newModelName - The model name after renaming

        Runs all validations in the Map of type AbstractValidator on the specified IDataModel.
        Parameters:
        dataModel - The specified IDataModel

      • resetMsgPanelAndValidationStatus

        private void resetMsgPanelAndValidationStatus(IValidationMsgPanel msgPanel)
        Resets IValidationMsgPanel and current validation status before the first validator starts.
        Parameters:
        msgPanel - the IValidationMsgPanel for the current file

      • getValidatorMessages

        private boolean getValidatorMessages(boolean isModelValid,
                                     IValidationMsgPanel msgPanel,
                                     IValidator validator)
        Handles all messages from the specified validator.
        Parameters:
        isModelValid - Current model "validity" state
        msgPanel - The IValidationMsgPanel
        validator - The IValidator
        Returns:
        The new "validity" state

      • handleMessage

        private boolean handleMessage(boolean isModelValid,
                              IValidationMsgPanel msgPanel,
                              IValidationMsg message)
        Handles the current message.
        Parameters:
        isModelValid - The previous state of isModelValid
        msgPanel - The IValidationMsgPanel
        message - The current IValidationMsg
        Returns:
        The new state of isModelValid

      • storeMaxSeverityLevel

        private void storeMaxSeverityLevel(java.lang.String modelName,
                                   EValidationResultSeverity nextSeverity)
        Stores the current severity level if higher than the previous.
        Parameters:
        modelName - The name of the model (This is intended to be the full path name of the PNML file represented by this model.)
        nextSeverity - the severity level of the last message from the current validator

      • returnResultToModel

        private void returnResultToModel(IDataModel dataModel,
                                 boolean isModelValid,
                                 IValidationMsgPanel msgPanel)
        Returns the result to the model and changes the background of the validation message panel if we have a result.

        But checks if the model was modified in the meantime! (In which case the last validation would already be obsolete.)
        Parameters:
        dataModel - The validated IDataModel
        isModelValid - The current validity of this data model
        msgPanel - The IValidationMsgPanel for this data model
